name: Paris Night Tour: Eiffel Tower & Montmartre
description: See the Eiffel Tower light up at night, then explore the charming streets of Montmartre. Enjoy a coffee at a cozy café with great views.

name: Rome Colosseum & Ancient Ruins Tour
description: The Eternal City, known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and iconic landmarks like the Colosseum, Vatican City, and Trevi Fountain. A cultural and historical hub with over 2,500 years of legacy!

name: New York City Highlights Tour
description: See top NYC sights like Times Square, Central Park, and the Statue of Liberty. Perfect for first-time visitors.

name: Tokyo Old & New Tour
description: Explore ancient temples and high-tech districts in Tokyo. Try sushi at a local restaurant and see the famous Shibuya Crossing.

name: Sydney Beaches & Harbour Tour
description: Visit Bondi Beach, the Sydney Opera House, and Harbour Bridge. Great for photos and ocean views.

name: Cape Town Scenic Tour
description: See Table Mountain, penguins at Boulders Beach, and stunning coastal views. Includes a cable car ride.

name: Rio de Janeiro City Tour
description: Visit Christ the Redeemer, Sugarloaf Mountain, and Copacabana Beach. Experience Rio’s vibrant culture.

name: Venice Gondola & Canals Tour
description: Take a romantic gondola ride through Venice’s canals and visit St. Mark’s Square. Includes gelato tasting.

name: Dubai City Tour
description: See the Burj Khalifa, Palm Jumeirah, and Dubai Mall. Option to visit the desert for a safari.

name: Bangkok Street Food Tour
description: Taste delicious Thai street food like pad thai, mango sticky rice, and more. Visit lively night markets.

name: Iceland Golden Circle Tour
description: See geysers, waterfalls, and the famous Blue Lagoon. Great for nature lovers.

name: Marrakech Market Tour
description: Explore colorful souks, try Moroccan tea, and visit historic palaces. A feast for the senses.

name: Kyoto Temples & Gardens Tour
description: Visit beautiful temples, bamboo forests, and traditional tea houses. Peaceful and scenic.

name: Barcelona Gaudi Tour
description: See the Sagrada Familia, Park Güell, and other famous Gaudi landmarks. Full of unique architecture.

name: Amsterdam Canals & Museums Tour
description: Take a boat ride through the canals and visit the Van Gogh Museum. A perfect mix of culture and fun.
